1. blood pressure machine make sure the power is off\n2. Press the button wireless transmission of blood pressure in the lower right-screen machine, the screen is displayed "PCL"\n3. Press the top right of the "pair" 1. blood pressure machine make sure the power is off\n2. Press the button wireless transmission of blood pressure in the lower right-screen machine, the screen is displayed "PCL"\n3. Press the top right of the "pair" 1. blood pressure machine make sure the power is off\n2. Press the button below the blue blood pressure machine, the screen is displayed "PCL"\n3. Press the top right of the "pair" 1. make sure the power is off blood pressure machine\n2. Press and blood pressure machine at the top left of the "M" button until the screen display "PCL"\n3. Press the top right of the "pairing"
1. make sure the power is off weight machine\n2. Press the "SET" button on weight machines, until the screen displays the Bluetooth icon\n3. Press the top right of the "pairing"
1. Turn on the power thermometer\n2. Press the top right of the "pairing" 1. Turn on the power and thermometer measurements, the upper left blue LED will start flashing\n2. Press the top right of the "pairing" 1. Turn on the power and the thermometer measurement is completed, the bottom blue LED will start flashing\n2. Press the top right of the "pairing" 1. Turn on the power thermometer\n2. Press the top right of the "pairing" 1. Please turn on the thermometer,and measure once( needing against to skin), until the upper left corner of thermometer screen appear blue tooth symbol.\n2. Then it is in detectable state,please tap on the "Pair" button at upper right corner of this page.
1. Turn on the power oxygen machine, oxygen machine at the top left blue LED will start flashing \n2. Press the top right of the "pairing" 1. Turn on the power and the thermometer measurement is completed, the bottom blue LED will start flashing\n2. Press the top right of the "pairing"
1. Turn on the power machine and the blood glucose measurement, the upper left of the blue LED light will start flashing; glucose machine or press the center button OFF until all logged calls occur, blood glucose meters will start flashing in the upper left of the blue LED\n2. press the upper right page. party "pairing" 1. Blood Glucose make sure the power is off \n2. The left switch unit glucose pull down at, the top left of the screen of the blue LED light will start flashing \n3. Press the top right of the "pair" 1. Blood Glucose make sure the power is off \n2. Press the wireless transmission of blood glucose meters screen lower right button, the screen will display "PCL" \n3. Press the top right of the "pair" Press the bottom right button of blood glucose measurement, and its screen will appear "BLE". The blue LED light at the upper corner will start twinkling,then please tap on the "Pair" button at upper right corner of this page. 1. Turn on the power machine and the blood glucose measurement, the left of the blue LED light will start flashing; glucose machine or press the center button OFF until all logged calls occur, blood glucose meters will start flashing in the upper left of the blue LED\n2. press the upper right page. party "pairing"
Put blue tooth dongle into the uric acid meter, the blue LED of the dongle will start twinkling and the screen will appear "PC". Then please tap on the "Pair" button at upper right corner of this page. Put blue tooth dongle into the uric acid meter, the blue LED of the dongle will start twinkling and the screen will appear "PC". Then please tap on the "Pair" button at upper right corner of this page. Press the bottom right button of uric acid meter, and its screen will appear "BLE". The blue LED light at the upper corner will start twinkling,then please tap on the "Pair" button at upper right corner of this page.
Put blue tooth dongle into the ketone meter, the blue LED of the dongle will start twinkling and the screen will appear "PC". Then please tap on the "Pair" button at upper right corner of this page.
Current device %s Start pairing Please turn on the device power again and re-measure,then click「Connect to Device」on the page

Imedi Plus DS101 instructions: 1. Please turn on the power of the stethoscope\n2. Tap "Start pairing again" at the bottom of this page
ACR3901U-S1 instructions: 1. Move the switch aside to Bluetooth sign. The blue light flashes as activated.\n2. Tap "Start pairing again" at the bottom of this page //藍芽設備操作說明 It\'s accessing to grabbing data of your results or you can type it in by yourself.
Showing “Σ” on the bottom of the screen of forehead thermometer means connected. Please operate directly to produce your records.
Please confirm your device already have measurement data,and It\'s accessing to grabing the latest one or you can type it in by yourself
Please turn on the power of the blood glucose meter. When the left blue LED starts flashing, please put in your finger directly and let it stay for about one minute.
It\'s accessing to grabbing data of your results.
It’s connecting to a card reader. Or you can skip it for the time being.
